text:
@realDonaldTrump The "much smaller crowd in D.C. than anticipated" is how your inaugural crowd was described before you doctored the pics.

If Obama left you bare cupboards, that explains the lack of crowds at your inauguration. They were afraid to catch COVID-19 on Jan 20, 2017 I guess.
